item.title: Code Highlighting
item.description: Code Fencing Use code fencing to highlight the syntax of a specific language. { "version": "0.2.0", "themes": [], "projects": [], "configuration": {} } <div class="highlight"> <pre> <code>some code...</code> </pre> </div> Highlight Partial Use the highlight partial to customize the layout of a specific code block. 199 200 201 202 203 204 205 206 207 208 209 210 211 212 213 214 215 216 217 218 // GetTitleFunc returns a func that can be used to transform a string to // title case.
